get.summary: Balance queries the balance of a single coin for a single account

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: address is the address to query balances for

parameters.name: denom
parameters.description: denom is the coin denom to query balances for.

balances.title: balances is the balances of the coins

bankQueryAllBalancesResponse.title: QueryAllBalancesResponse is the response type for the Query/AllBalances RPC method

balance.title: balance is the balance of the coin

bankQueryBalanceResponse.title: QueryBalanceResponse is the response type for the Query/Balance RPC method

amount.title: amount is the supply of the coin

bankQuerySupplyOfResponse.title: QuerySupplyOfResponse is the response type for the Query/SupplyOf RPC method

supply.title: supply is the supply of the coins

bankQueryTotalSupplyResponse.title: QueryTotalSupplyResponse is the response type for the Query/TotalSupply RPC method

cosmosCoin.description:
Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.
